lore.description: Passive glider that prefers to dwell near acid waters.
lore.journal_entry: What careless a life led drifting above us all. If one ever comes too close to the ground though...

lore.description: SSimple-minded crawling fungus. Its cap is covered in a layer of hardened spikes.
lore.journal_entry: Lie on your belly, open your maw and let this tasty morsel stroll straight into your stomach.

behavior.attack_pattern: Charges at player at short distance

lore.description: Hardened squit, bred for battle in the Colosseum of Fools. Tougher and more aggressive than its wild ancestor.
lore.journal_entry: Strong and quick! When they rear back, either move out of the way or prepare to strike back!

lore.description: Recently birthed, these young aspid instinctively swarm around intruders.
lore.journal_entry: These hatchlings are born with an instinct to kill! They are still only infants though, and you can crush them between your fangs without thinking. Just don't let them overwhelm you with numbers.

lore.description: Bests its prey by spitting corrosive liquid. Often hunts in packs.
lore.journal_entry: Cunning predators that will try to pick you off from a distance. Don't give them any space, just charge in and cut them down! You'll find they're not so cunning once they are dead.

lore.description: Carries the eggs of its young inside its belly. Can hatch and birth its young as needed to deal with intruders.
lore.journal_entry: Shamelessly uses its own young as a weapon against its foes! Appalling, yes, but I do admire its resourcefulness. Good hunters do not always make good parents.
Ancient creature covered in rock-hard shell. Rolls when threatened.
Battle-hardened Obble from the Colosseum.
Flies toward prey and explodes on contact.
Hangs from ceilings and drops when disturbed.
Simple flying creature found in the cliffs.
Lays eggs that hatch into Dirtcarvers.
Lumafly charged with crystal energy.
Emerges from corpses in the dark depths.
Once a citizen, now a cowardly shell.
Harmless bug that crawls along the ground.
Crawls on crystal surfaces.
Flies and shoots crystal projectiles.
Husk enhanced by crystal energy.
Colosseum variant of the Loodle.
Skilled hunter of the deep tunnels.
Burrows through the deep earth.
Burrows through dirt and attacks unexpectedly.
Larger and more aggressive moss kin.
Jumps toward its prey.
Ancient elder of the Baldur species.
Emerges from the ground when disturbed.
Immature form of the Fluke.
Floats through the watery tunnels.
Adult form of the Fluke. Highly aggressive.
Large and powerful Fluke variant.
Wanders the ancient depths.
Aggressive charger from the Colosseum.
Husk taken over by fungal growth.
Bounces around the fungal growths.
Shoots toxic spores at its prey.
Colosseum variant of the Vengefly.
Massive creature that moves through deep tunnels.
Carries crystal growths on its back.
Overfed husk that moves slowly but hits hard.
Embedded in walls and floors. Immobile but dangerous.
Once a noble, now a beautifully dressed husk.
Larger and more powerful Hopper variant.
Elite sentry of the city guard.
Master-level member of the Grimm Troupe.
Nightmare variant of the Grimmkin.
Novice member of the Grimm Troupe.
Mimics the appearance of a Grub to lure prey.
Slow, clumsy creature that flies in straight lines.
Large and powerful fungal creature.
Heavily armored Fool from the Colosseum.
Heavily armored city sentry.
Guardian of the Hive's inner chambers.
Soldier of the Hive, fiercely protective.
Basic worker of the Hive. Attacks in swarms.
Jumps across the rocky terrain.
Minion created by Zote in the dream realm.
Aggressive husk that attacks with brute force.
Once a fashionable citizen, now an empty shell.
Former city guard, still patrolling its post.
Husk that has become a nest for Hivelings.
Husk that charges when prey gets too close.
Former miner, still swinging its pickaxe.
Stationed guard husk of the city.
Trained warrior husk with combat skills.
Burrows through the muddy waterways.
Infected creature that floats and explodes.
Construct created to guard the White Palace.
City guard armed with a lance.
Husk that leaps toward its prey.
Younger, smaller version of the Brooding Mawlek.
Floats aimlessly through Greenpath.
Infected creature that floats through infected areas.
Small weaver spider of Deepnest.
Rolls across the rocky terrain of Kingdom's Edge.
Small, harmless creature found throughout Hallownest.
Flying mantis traitor from Kingdom's Edge.
Mantis that betrayed its tribe for the infection.
Elite warrior of the Mantis Tribe.
Young mantis still training in combat.
Flies through the fungal caverns.
Burrowing relative of the Mawlek.
Extremely rare bug that repairs signs in Hallownest.
Strange creature found in the Ancient Basin.
Charges across the mossy grounds.
Mosskin trained in combat with a sword.
Timid moss creature that flees from danger.
Flies away when approached.
Common moss creature of Greenpath.
Wanders the mossy paths of Greenpath.
Flies and spits projectiles at its prey.
Aggressive jellyfish that chases and explodes.
Swims through the watery tunnels.
Ancient Aspid species with deadly triple spit.
Guardian of the Spirit's Glade. Do not disturb.
Servant of the White Palace.
The lingering soul of a fallen bug. Must be reclaimed.
Moves silently through the dark depths.
Crawls across crystal surfaces.
Baldur with sharp spikes on its shell.
Colosseum Fool armed with a shield.
Large and powerful shrumal creature.
Shrumal creature trained for combat.
Small, peaceful shrumal creature.
Being of void from the Abyss.
Swift fighter from the Colosseum.
Husk that drools infection constantly.
Teleports around and shoots soul projectiles.
Warrior trained in soul magic.
Husk covered in sharp spines.
Stationary fungus that shoots spores.
Floats through the air and charges at prey.
Stalks its prey through the dark tunnels.
Sturdy fighter from the Colosseum.
Crawls on ceilings and drops when prey passes below.
Jellyfish that explodes when attacked.
Aggressive flying creature that charges at intruders.
Extremely aggressive husk from the Colosseum.
Tendrils of void that emerge from the darkness.
Unpredictable Gruzzer from the Colosseum.
Mosskin that explodes when prey gets too close.
Zoteling that explodes on contact.
Flies and creates electric attacks.
Mindless husk that wanders aimlessly.

Flying sentry of the city guard.
